# Zeke Sikelianos

> Personal site with projects, writing, talks, and career history of Zeke Sikelianos, a designer and software developer.

Use these links to find the main sections of the site.

## Main

- [Home](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/): Index of recent pages and sections.
- [Bio](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/bio): Background and personal overview.
- [Projects](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/projects): Portfolio of projects.
- [Posts](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/posts): Writing and links.
- [Talks](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/talks): Talks, interviews, podcasts.

## Career

- [CV](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/cv): Work history and education.

## Contact

- [Contact](https://zeke.sikelianos.com/contact): Social links and email.
